pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a set of Python bindings for the libcups library from theCUPS project.>>> # Example of getting a list of printers>>> import cups>>> conn = cups.Connection ()>>> printers = conn.getPrinters ()>>> for printer in printers:... print printer, printers[printer]["device-uri"]...HP ipp://192.168.1.1:631/printers/HPduplex ipp://192.168.1.1:631/printers/duplexHP-LaserJet-6MP ipp://192.168.1.1:631/printers/HP-LaserJet-6MPEPSON-Stylus-D78 usb://EPSON/Stylus%20D78
